PROFESIONAL_DESCRIPTION: Full Stack Web Developer & Database Administrator with 9+ years of experience designing, developing, and maintaining scalable, high-performance web applications. Proven expertise in both frontend and backend development using Angular, React, Node.js, and PHP. Skilled in implementing CI/CD pipelines, optimizing SQL databases, and leading modernization projects to improve efficiency and code quality. Recognized for problem-solving, mentoring, and delivering secure, reliable software solutions that align with business objectives.

ACTIVITIES.3: Optimized code performance and scalability using reactive forms in Angular.
ACTIVITIES.4: Mentored junior developers on clean architecture and state management best practices.
ACTIVITIES.5: Integrated legacy systems into new modular architectures, improving maintainability.
